text: Judy Justice is an American streaming reality court show. It is a spin-off of the courtroom series Judge Judy. It is presided over by former Manhattan Family Court Judge Judith Sheindlin. The show features Sheindlin deciding real-life small-claims disputes in a simulated courtroom set. Before starting, all the people involved sign arbitration contracts agreeing to Sheindlin's decision. Category:American reality television series
title: Judy Justice
